pr_title: Support partition schema evolution for ORC and Parquet

timeline.bodyText: Let's make these boolean and call this partition_use_column_names which matches orc_use_column_names and parquet_use_column_names.
timeline.author: dain

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we need equals and hashCode.  The only use I see is in a test, which can just test on getColumnCoercions
timeline.author: dain

timeline.bodyText: Maybe parquet_use_column_names must be set when is set partition_use_column_names
timeline.author: dain

timeline.bodyText: If not to difficult, I would split this into two commits: "Add table to partition schema evolution by name" and then the parquet part separately.
timeline.author: dain

replies.bodyText: I would leave it as it is. It is quite simple code.
replies.author: kokosing

timeline.author: dain

timeline.bodyText: This would be easier to read as a builder.
timeline.author: dain

timeline.bodyText: may be isIdentityMapping is more descriptive?
timeline.author: phd3
phd3

timeline.bodyText: use format instead of parquet for tableName
timeline.author: phd3

timeline.message: Support schema evolution in partition schema for Parquet
Support partition schema evolution for ORC
